name: <a href>
definition: Links are created using the <a> tag. A link is what moves the user to a new page. The href is the reference which tells the browser which page to go to.

name: <body>
definition: The <body> tag is what contains all of the HTML that the user actually sees.

name: <div>
definition: The <div> tag is used for grouping sections of information and helping to format your HTML.

name: <H1>, <H2>, <H3>, <H4>, <H5>, <H6>
definition: The H-tags are used for headlines for your sections. <h1> is the largest, while <h6> is the smallest.
